prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a shell and strong arms for swimming.
I want to see a rugged turtle-like creature with blue and gray colors.
Generate a Pokemon with a sturdy build and aquatic features, perfect for battling.
Make an image of a tough-looking sea creature that resembles a prehistoric turtle.
Imagine a Pokemon with a large shell and powerful flippers for moving through water.
Design a Pokemon that combines elements of a turtle and a dinosaur.
Give me a unique water-type Pokemon that stands out with its bold coloring.
